resources.string: Sync & Backup Unavailable\nSorry, but Sync & Backup is currently unavailable. Please try again later.
Sync & Backup Unavailable\nSorry, but Sync & Backup is no longer available in this app version. Please update DuckDuckGo to the latest version to continue.
Sync & Backup Unavailable\nSorry, but Sync & Backup is currently unavailable. Please try again later.
Sync & Backup Unavailable\nSorry, but Sync & Backup is no longer available in this app version. Please update DuckDuckGo to the latest version to continue.
Sync & Backup Paused\nSorry, but Sync & Backup is currently unavailable. Please try again later.
Sync & Backup Paused\nSorry, but Sync & Backup is no longer available in this app version. Please update DuckDuckGo to the latest version to continue.
Sync & Backup Paused\nSorry, but Sync & Backup is currently unavailable. Please try again later.
Sync Error\nSync & Backup is temporarily unavailable.
Sync Error\nSync & Backup is temporarily unavailable.
Sync is Paused\nSync has been paused. If you want to continue syncing this device, reconnect using another device or your recovery code.
Securely sync bookmarks and passwords between your devices.
Your data is end-to-end encrypted, and DuckDuckGo does not have access to the encryption key.
Sync and Back Up This Device
Your data is end-to-end encrypted, and DuckDuckGo does not have access to the decryption key.
Your bookmarks and passwords are being prepared to sync. This should only take a moment.
Automatically download icons for synced bookmarks.
Sync and Back Up This Device

This creates an encrypted backup of your bookmarks and passwords on DuckDuckGo’s secure server, which can be synced with your other devices. \n\n The encryption key is only stored on your device, DuckDuckGo cannot access it.
You can sync with your other devices later.
To restore your synced data, you\'ll need the Recovery Code you saved when you first set up Sync. This code may have been saved as a PDF on the device you originally used to set up Sync.
Point camera at QR code to sync
Go to Settings > Sync & Back Up in the DuckDuckGo Browser on another device and select \"Sync With Another Device.\"
Scan this code with another device to sync.
Go to Settings > Sync & Backup > Sync With Another Device and select View Text Code in the DuckDuckGo App on another synced device and paste the code here to sync this device.
If you lose access to your devices, you will need this code to recover your synced data.
Anyone with access to this code can access your synced data, so please keep it in a safe place.
Scan the QR code on your Recovery PDF, or another synced device, to recover your data.
Go to Settings > Sync & Back Up in the DuckDuckGo App on a different device and scan to connect instantly.
Turn Off and Delete Server Data…
If you lose access to your devices, you will need this code to recover your synced data.
Anyone with access to this code can access your synced data, so please keep it in a safe place.
This Device will no longer be able to access your synced data
Save recovery PDF requires storage permission
The Recovery Code allows you to sync your bookmarks across multiple devices and recover your synced data if you lose access to a device.
Keep this information safe and secure.
Open DuckDuckGo on another device and go to Sync in Settings.
Scan the QR code or copy and paste the text code into another DuckDuckGo app.
Sync will be activated and you\'ll once again have access to all of your data.
\"%1$s\" will no longer be able to access your synced data.
Use this code after choosing \"Manually Enter Code\" during sync setup on a second device
Please go to your device\'s settings and grant permission for this app to access your camera.
Get notified in the event Sync & Backup encounters an error.
Unable to turn Sync & Backup off.
Unable to update the device name.
Unable to remove this device from Sync & Backup.
Unable to delete data on the server.
To pair these devices, turn off Sync & Backup on one device then tap "Sync with Another Device" on the other device.
Unable to connect to the server.
Unable to Sync with another device.
Unable to connect to the server.
Sorry, this code is invalid. Please make sure the correct code was entered or scanned.
Unable to create the recovery PDF.
Sync & Backup is end-to-end encrypted, and needs to be able to encrypt and store data on your device. Because your device does not support encrypted storage, Sync & Backup is unavailable.
Unlock device to access Sync & Backup.
Secure your device to use Sync & Backup
A device lock pattern, PIN, or biometrics is required to use Sync & Backup.
All devices will be disconnected and your synced data will be deleted from the server.
No account needed. End-to-end encryption means nobody but you can see your passwords, not even us.
No account needed. End-to-end encryption means nobody but you can see your bookmarks, not even us.
Get DuckDuckGo on other devices to sync with this one

string.name: syncGetAppsOnOtherPlatformInstruction
string.instruction: A URL will be shown after this string

resources.string: To download DuckDuckGo on desktop or another mobile device, visit:

string.name: syncGetAppsOnOtherPlatformInstructionUrlLinkCopied
string.instruction: This is shown after the user taps on the link, to confirm it was copied to their device clipboard
